events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the purchase immediately.
The issue has been reviewed and classified under refund requests because the customer wants their money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to verify the refund request?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that arrived today.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email shortly.
That sounds good, I appreciate your quick response and look forward to receiving the refund confirmation.
Your refund has been completed and the amount credited back to your original payment method successfully.
Just checking in to ensure that you received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was successfully processed and no further assistance was needed, we have now closed your case.
